subject: Hockey, Ice
lead_paragraph: Brendan Shanahan, the head of the N.H.L. department of player safety, will be inducted into the Hockey Hall of Fame on Monday for a career that includes three Stanley Cups and an Olympic gold medal.
snippet: Brendan Shanahan, the head of the N.H.L. department of player safety, will be inducted into the Hockey Hall of Fame on Monday for a career that includes three Stanley Cups and an Olympic gold medal.
